data.text: @DrJacobsRad Further evidence closing schools was a horrible mistake

@ChrisInToronto1 @DrJacobsRad Your childish name calling aside, everyone admitted to hospital is tested, therefore hospital numbers are accurate no matter what testing requirements outside of hospital are.
@daclub7001 @DrJacobsRad @brianlilley Keeps yours on forever. No one will stop you.
@HappyJimmy2022 @LittleRedRomano @DrJacobsRad Neither helped. Waves come and go.
@DrJacobsRad @RuthLam12053378 Wrong.  Failed to Fills are still at an all time high.  Schools are not safe.  Teachers and kids deserve a safe place to teach and learn.

@DrJacobsRad @brianlilley It show all the lies about covid... More and more people out for the last 2 month and less case...
What a farce....
@DrJacobsRad @drlucymcbride Do we finally get to say “I told ya so?“
